body.p: You can delete images, as needed. A deleted image is no longer available. Any instances launched from the deleted instance are not affected.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.

Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Images tab.
The images in the domain are listed.
In the Images screen, click the check box next to the image name you want to delete. To select all images, click the check box next to Image Name the top row of the image list.
Click Delete to delete the image.
The image is no longer available. Any instances launched from the deleted instance are not affected.
